::Spears::

She covered her eyes and held her breath as the was taking off.  
She shook from fear and beads of sweat started to appaer on her 
forehead.  She just prayed that the flight would be soon over and 
have her feet back on solid ground.
 
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker laughs as Spears sits on her quills. He walks in, shaking 
his head, 
> the door closing behind him.
> 
> "Allright," he says, pushing a few buttons, "All systems go."
> 
> The pod shakes slightly as the engines activate, the pod flying off.
